## Create vectors

```{r}
rain        <- c(10, 6, 7, 20L)
scaled_Rain <- 5 * rain
```

## **Make matrix**

```{r}
values <- seq(from = 1, to = 50, length = 9)
```

```{r}
matrix <- matrix(values, nrow=3, ncol = 3, byrow = TRUE)
```

```{r}
matrixA <- matrix(seq(from=1, to= 30, length = 6),
                  nrow=3, ncol=2,
                  byrow=F)
```

Matrix multiplication

```{r}
matrix %*% matrixA
```
